1:
How fortunate are you who have an awesome respect for him\q2 and do what he wants you to do.
\q1
2:
You will be able to enjoy the food you provide yourself with;\q1 you will be fortunate and prosperous.


\q1
3:
Your wife will be like a grapevine that bears many grapes;\q2 she will give birth to many children.
\q1 Your children who sit around your table;
\q1 you will be like a strong olive tree that has many shoots growing up around it.
\q1
4: Like that, Yahweh will bless every man who has an awesome respect for him.\q1
5:
I wish that God in his temple on Mount Zion may help you greatly,\q1 and that you will see the people of Jerusalem prospering every day that you live!
\q2
6:
I wish that you may live many years\q2 and that you may have grandchildren and be able to see them.
\q1 I wish that things may go well for people in Israel!
